newsitem.title: USA: NOTICE OF SALE - Petaluma, Calif. School District.
newsitem.headline: NOTICE OF SALE - Petaluma, Calif. School District.

text.p: NOTICE IS HEREBY GIVEN that each of the above issu
Bonds will be separately offered for public sale by the Board of Supervisors of the County of Sonoma, State of California, on Tuesday,
at the hour of 10:00 A.M., California time (or on such other date and time as may be determined by the County as provided in the paragraph below), at the offices of Orrick,
Herrington & Sutcliffe LLP, 400 Sansome Street, San

Francisco, CA 94111, subject to all of the terms and conditions of the Official Notice of Sale describing the appropriate issue of Bonds, copies of which (along with a Preliminary Official Statement relating to the Bonds) will be furnished upon request to Kelling, Northcross & Nobriga, Inc., 1333 Broadway, Suite 1000, Oakland, CA 94612

Any sale date for the Bonds may be changed at the sole discretion of the County by providing notice thereof through Thompson Municipal News and Bloomberg Business News at least twenty-four (24) hours prior to the then-scheduled sale date of the Bonds.
Clerk of the Board of Supervisors
of the County of Sonoma, California
